title: Cowgirl's Justice: A Novel of Romance, Intrigue & Murder
description: The town of Danville has changed little since Jesse Walker left her childhood home, the Running W Ranch. However, the people living around there have changed considerably. After leaving an abusive husband she returns home to find she has become a target. Someone is terrorizing the town, killing her animals, and threatening her life. Is it the cult that has taken up residence in the area or someone else? While not looking for a new relationship she finds herself intrigued by a local ranch hand, Justin, who neither wants nor needs a woman in his life. Jesse, Justin, Logan the ranch caretaker, and her best friend Marnie, must get to the bottom of the plan to drive her away before more people are hurt or killed and the town of Danville is changed forever.
author: Dawn Nelson
